data.current_summary: Execute a SQLite SQL query against the content database
data.current_description: Accepts SQLite SQL query, returns JSON. Does not allow PRAGMA statements.
data.summary_suggestion: Execute SQL query against Datasette database
data.description_suggestion: Executes a SQLite SQL query against the Datasette database and returns results as JSON. Accepts query parameters to specify the SQL statement.
